message:
This blog post is about updating UI apps, and the example code is using WinForms. This is 100% completely different than WebForms.

In particular, async does not change the HTTP protocol ([http://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/08/async-doesnt-change-http-protocol.html](http://blog.stephencleary.com/2012/08/async-doesnt-change-http-protocol.html)). If you want to update a HTML UI dynamically with progress, check out SignalR (which does have built-in support for IProgress<t>).
